title: Mine Runner
description: Mine Runne is an endless runner game that takes you on an ultimate running adventure through the mine. Collect gems, avoid obstacles, and choose your character from a variety of options such as humans, robots, zombies, and cats. Use special power-ups like magnets and fast runs to boost your speed and survive longer. Upgrade power-ups and unlock rewards as you run faster and faster through the mine tunnel. Can you survive this thrilling 3D mine run adventure?
